lead_paragraph: Barney Springboro, a brilliant but shy student, finds he is gifted in telekinesis. His extraordinary powers make him famous. Friends appeal to him, girls fall into his arms and as for his parents... they call upon an exorcist.
snippet: Barney Springboro, a brilliant but shy student, finds he is gifted in telekinesis. His extraordinary powers make him famous. Friends appeal to him, girls fall into his arms and as for his parents... they call upon an exorcist.
